title: IHoleSeriesFeatureData2.GetHoleBottomMateEntity
description: Gets the entity to which the bottom of the hole is mated in this hole series.
signature:
System.Object GetHoleBottomMateEntity( 
   System.Int32
HoleInstance
,
   System.Int16
HoleType
)

parameters.name: HoleType
parameters.description: Type of hole as defined by swWzdHoleTypes_e

returns: Entity to which the bottom of the hole is mated
